name: Haunted House Hobble
description:
Sound Required Trick or treaters beware!

This Halloween you've picked the wrong neighborhood for your trick or treating rituals.

It seems every classic monster lives in this one neighborhood and only one specified monster isn't in the monster mood.

How to play:

Follow the monster's growls, groans, and gurgles to the safe door with your mouse's cursor. But beware, other monsters will try their best to trick you into picking the wrong door!

Try to find as many safe doors as you can before the night is over, or it's too late!
